participant_1.name: Emily

participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

content.text: hi, how are you? I live in pennsylvania. I am a pa
I'm fine. Do you like children?
I do. my husband is in pennsylvania. do you have children?
Not yet but I work with kids.
I have a husband. he is a pa in pennsylvania. do you work?
Yes, I work in the school.
that is a lot of work. I work as a new pa
What do you mean by pa?
I do not know. I am pregnant. do you read? I like a lot
